text: Baykal (port) () is a rural locality in Russia, Irkutsk oblast, Sliudanskyy region. ==Geography== The village is near Lake Baikal and is setted on the left coast of the river, Angara. In the right coast is Listvianka. The administrative centre Irkutsk is 60 kilometers north. There is an automobile ferry to Listvianka. ==Population== In 2005, there were 400 people living in Baikal village. In USSR times there were about 10000 humans. Category:Rural localities in Russia Category:Irkutsk Oblast
title: Baykal (port)
